item.title: 瑞士的中立态度阻碍了其国防工业的发展
item.description:
在俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰之后，严格的武器出口规定威胁到该国规模虽小但具有重要象征意义的工业。【原文：

Strict export rules for arms threaten the country’s small but symbolically important industry in the wake of Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

】

item.title: 美国航运业下滑，中国延迟数日发布贸易数据
item.description: 由于企业减少了对美国的出口，中国尚未公布上周贸易流量的常规统计数据，从而推迟了一组备受关注的数据的公布。【原文：China is yet to announce regular statistics on trade flows for last week, delaying a closely watched data set as firms cut back on exports to the US.】

item.title: 中国制造业放缓，铜价从四周高位回落
item.description: 铜价从 4 月初以来的最高收盘价回落，此前的数据显示中国的工厂活动有所减少，这表明与美国的贸易冲突正在对亚洲最大的经济体造成冲击。【原文：Copper retreated from its highest close since early April after data showed a retreat in China’s factory activity, offering a sign of how trade conflict with the US is hitting Asia’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 野村中国亏损收窄，券商寻求扭亏为盈
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. posted a smaller loss at its joint venture in China last year, as the brokerage seeks to turn around the business in the face of slowing growth and trade tensions.】

item.title: 印度保险公司计划将 410 亿美元的交易转为债券远期交易
item.description: 印度的保险公司已经准备好接受周五开始交易的债券远期协议，这是提高该国 1.3 万亿美元政府债务市场流动性和复杂性的最新举措。【原文：India’s insurance companies are ready to embrace bond forwards agreements that start trading on Friday, the latest step to enhance the liquidity and sophistication of the nation’s $1.3 trillion government debt market.】

item.title: 印度银行抓住看涨情绪推动融资
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中资银行股价暴跌，原因是盈利显示利润率和利润受损
item.description: 中资银行盈利疲软，股价暴跌，分析师担心全球贸易战将进一步削弱其利润。【原文：Shares of Chinese banks slumped following weak earnings, with analysts concerned the global trade war will further undermine their profit.】

item.title: 习近平考察孵化器后，中国人工智能股票大涨
item.description: 国家主席习近平参观上海人工智能创新中心后，中国智能设备制造商股价上涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese smart-device manufacturers rose after president Xi Jinping visited an artificial-intelligence innovation center in Shanghai.】

item.title: Pop Mart 持有者在股价上涨后出售 1.01 亿美元股份
item.description: 在中国玩具公司的股价本周创下新纪录后，Pop Mart International Group Ltd.（其粉丝包括 K-pop 乐队 Blackpink 的 Lisa）的一位投资者通过大宗交易筹集了 1.01 亿美元。【原文：An investor in Pop Mart International Group Ltd., whose fans include K-pop band Blackpink’s Lisa, raised $101 million in a block trade after the Chinese toy company’s shares hit a fresh record this week.】

item.title: 天齐锂业在连续五个季度亏损后恢复盈利
item.description: 中国天齐锂业公司（Tianqi Lithium Corp. ）在连续五个季度出现亏损后扭亏为盈，原因是生产和销售的增长抵消了关键电池材料价格的低迷。【原文：China’s Tianqi Lithium Corp. swung to profitability after five straight quarterly losses as increased production and sales offset languishing prices for the key battery material.】

item.title: 澳大利亚超预期的通胀令货币升值
item.description: 澳大利亚前三个月的核心通胀率高于预期，抑制了人们对今年一系列快速降息的预期，并使货币走高。【原文：Australia’s core inflation came in hotter than expected in the first three months, damping expectations of a rapid series of interest-rate cuts this year and sending the currency higher.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，中国工厂生产活动创 2023 年以来最慢纪录
item.description: 中国的工厂活动陷入了自 2023 年 12 月以来最严重的萎缩，显示出与美国的贸易战对世界第二大经济体造成的早期损害。【原文：China’s factory activity slipped into the worst contraction since December 2023, revealing early damage to the world’s second-biggest economy from the trade war with the US.】

item.title: 苹果公司在最新变动中重组政府事务和音乐部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司正在分别对其全球事务部门和音乐部门的管理层进行调整，这延续了这家 iPhone 制造商近期的一系列变动。【原文：Apple Inc. is shuffling the management of its global affairs and music divisions in separate moves, extending a series of recent changes at the iPhone maker, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 即使在特朗普关税影响最严重之前，中国太阳能企业的亏损也在加深
item.description: 中国太阳能制造商继续深陷亏损泥潭，而且由于天价出口关税有可能加剧国内供过于求，前景愈发黯淡。【原文：Chinese solar manufacturers continue to plunge deeper into the red, and the outlook is getting gloomier as sky-high tariffs on exports threaten to compound domestic oversupply.】

item.title: Man Group称，随着中国市场的崛起，日本汽车制造商将迎来兼并潮
item.description: 全球最大上市对冲基金公司的一位投资组合经理表示，在关税肆虐的环境下，日本依赖出口的汽车行业将被迫进行整合，以应对竞争。【原文：Japan’s export-reliant auto sector will be forced to consolidate to combat competition in an environment roiled by tariffs, according to a portfolio manager at the world’s largest publicly traded hedge fund firm.】

item.title: 销售稳定、汇率收益，LG 能源利润超出预期
item.description: LG Energy Solution Ltd. 公布的第一季度利润超出分析师预期，主要得益于美国需求强于预期和有利的汇率。【原文：LG Energy Solution Ltd. reported first-quarter profit that exceeded analyst expectations, helped by stronger-than-expected demand from the US and favorable exchange rates.】

item.title: 台积电开始在亚利桑那州建设第三座工厂，加大在美国的扩张力度
item.description: 在特朗普政府威胁进一步征收关税以刺激美国制造业之际，台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. has begun construction on a third chip plant in Arizona, ramping up its US expansion as the Trump administration threatens further tariffs to spur American manufacturing.】

item.title: 索尼集团被指考虑分拆芯片后股价飙升
item.description: 据说索尼集团公司正在酝酿分拆其半导体部门，从而引发了人们对这一举措将释放这家日本娱乐和电子公司价值的期望，之后索尼集团公司股价大涨。【原文：Sony Group Corp. shares surged after it was said to be mulling spinning off its semiconductor unit, raising expectations that such a move would unlock value in the Japanese entertainment and electronics company.】

item.title: 韩国聘请银行出售外币债券
item.description: 本月早些时候，韩国最高法院解除了前总统尹锡烈的职务，韩国为潜在的外币债券销售聘请了银行，这似乎将是对投资者对韩国债务偏好的一次关键考验。【原文：South Korea hired banks for a potential foreign-currency bond sale, in what looks set to be a key test of investor appetite for the nation’s debt after its top court removed former President Yoon Suk Yeol earlier this month.】

item.title: 新加坡-美国掉期利率将因政策放松赌注而收窄
item.description: 随着货币宽松政策押注的增加，新加坡和美元利率掉期之间的差距预计将从接近有记录以来最宽的水平缩小。【原文：The gap between Singapore and US dollar interest-rate swaps is expected to narrow from near the widest level on record as monetary easing bets grow.】

item.title: 加强库存管理后，三星芯片业务超出预期
item.description: 三星电子公司芯片部门公布的利润好于预期，因为中国客户在美国加征关税前急于囤积供应。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s chip division reported better-than-expected profit after Chinese customers rushed to stockpile supplies ahead of US tariffs.】

item.title: 斯坦查特称印度绿色规则的明确性将促进交易
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）认为，如果没有一个所谓的分类框架，为气候融资设立一个警戒线，印度将很难实现其绿色目标。【原文：India could struggle to meet its green targets without a so-called taxonomy framework, which creates guardrails around what can pass as climate finance, according to Standard Chartered Plc.】

item.title: 日本工厂产出下降，显示关税前的脆弱
item.description: 日本上个月的工厂产出下降，表明制造商在应对唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税运动所带来的不确定性时，势头有所减弱。【原文：Japan’s factory output fell last month, indicating flagging momentum for manufacturers as they coped with uncertainties surrounding Donald Trump’s sweeping tariff campaign.】

item.title: 投票临近，特朗普表示计划与澳大利亚总理商谈贸易问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示有可能再次与澳大利亚总理通话，讨论他对美国长期盟友澳大利亚征收关税的问题。【原文：US President Donald Trump has flagged the possibility of another call with Australia’s prime minister to discuss tariffs he imposed on the longtime American ally.】

item.title: 尽管存在贸易争端，迪士尼和环球电影仍将在中国上映
item.description: 即使与美国的贸易争端仍在继续，中国仍对好莱坞电影敞开大门。【原文：China is keeping the door open for Hollywood movies, even with the ongoing trade dispute with the US.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，避险需求减弱，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统缓解了部分汽车关税的影响，并指出与一些国家的贸易谈判取得了进展，黄金在周二下跌后持稳。【原文：Gold was steady after dropping Tuesday as President Donald Trump eased the impact of some auto tariffs and pointed to progress in trade negotiations with several countries.】

item.title: Sunnova 正在洽谈为可能的破产融资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，屋顶太阳能电池板系统销售商 Sunnova Energy International Inc.【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc., a seller of rooftop solar-panel systems, is in discussions with its creditors to borrow money to finance a potential bankruptcy, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 贸易战和库存增加给石油前景蒙上阴影，石油止跌回升
item.description: 由于有迹象表明贸易战正在损害经济增长，而且一个行业组织指出美国库存增加，石油维持在三周低点附近。【原文：Oil held near a three-week low — after tumbling more than 2% on Tuesday — on signs that the trade war is hurting economic growth, and as an industry group flagged a rise in US stockpiles.】

item.title: Grab 上调预期，因乘车需求带动收入超出预期
item.description: 在季度销售额超过预期后，Grab 控股有限公司上调了全年盈利预期，这表明在受全球贸易紧张局势影响的科技行业中，东南亚打车和食品配送市场可能是一个亮点。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. raised its full-year earnings forecast after quarterly sales beat estimates, a sign that the Southeast Asian ride-hailing and food-delivery market might be a bright spot in a tech industry rattled by global trade tensions.】

item.title: 印度买家对节日期间飙升的金价望而却步
item.description: 本周早些时候，准新娘阿皮塔-阿加瓦尔（Arpita Agarwal）来到印度最大的黄金市场之一，为她的婚礼宾客购买传统首饰，包括男士的链子和女士的戒指。但当她穿梭在德里老城 Chandni Chowk 的拥挤小巷时，高昂的价格让她不得不重新考虑。【原文：Bride-to-be Arpita Agarwal visited one of India’s largest gold markets earlier this week to buy traditional jewelry for her wedding guests — chains for men and rings for women. But as she navigated the crowded lanes of Old Delhi’s Chandni Chowk, the lofty prices made her reconsider.】
